channel.title: I need help turning into a NPC
channel.description: k, I"m working on my server and i need to know how to make my account into a dragon, and dragon of any kind. ive went through the Tuts section and found one but it did not work and ive heard of a command "::npc ####" but that does not work or maby its wrong. well can anyone help? :rolleyes:[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 10:30:25 PM[/size][hr][s]proud owner of spyro's isle[/s]. -shut down- curantly working on spyro's isle 2 ||| 3% done.

item.title: I need help turning into a NPC
item.dc:creator: @Ahaha_Rob Ahaha Rob
item.description:
@Ahaha_Rob wrote:

if the ::pnpc dont work add the command to your server.
